title: [K-12] Effective Social Studies Learning Design Using Multimedia

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational knowledge of social studies
context.additional_context: Interactive classroom environment using digital devices (tablets/laptops), emphasizing applied skills through project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can design social studies lecture materials by applying multimedia principles (cognitive load theory, dual-channel processing, etc.)
Information delivery efficiency can be improved by over 30% using text-image synchronization, emphasis techniques, etc.
Learners can produce and evaluate learner-engagement multimedia content using PPT/video tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
